selected_quotes: Comment on László A (2013): Blood lipid peroxidation, antioxidant enzyme activities and hemorheological changes

citation.abstract: Early infantile autism is a severe form of childhood psychiatric disease with characteristic symptoms. Hyperserotoninaemia in 43.5%, lactic acidosis 43% and hyperpyruvataemia in 30% were biochemically demonstrated in autistic children. Our earlier results led to the postulation that a dissequilibrium in the blood redox is involved in infantile autism; the oxidative loading and the antioxidant defending enzyme system were investigated together with the hemorheological parameters in infantile autism.
citation.title: Blood lipid peroxidation, antioxidant enzyme activities and hemorheological changes in autistic children.

googleplus.title: There exists an oxidative stress in children with infantile autism http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed...
